and Social care&lt;https://www.gov.uk/government/topics/social-care&gt;+ others&lt;https://www.gov.uk/government/news/final-care-act-guidance-published&gt; [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-29T08:47:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;e2115acd.1410</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;9d3c4c18.1410">   <title>NPC's annual conference: Don't miss out on the latest thinking on high impact! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;9d3c4c18.1410</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br>Northumbria University<br>http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk/&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see the attached information for contact details.<br><br>View this email in your browser&lt;http://npc-news.org/UL9-2UX9B-BF6628G7E6/cr.aspx?v=0&gt;<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>&lt;http://npc-news.org/UL9-2UX9B-6628G7-1AIYC0-1/c.aspx&gt;[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/5/4/6/9/3/files/imagecache/4802015/w86_5230881_thirdsector_logo_box.jpg]&lt;http://npc-news.org/UL9-2UX9B-6628G7-1AIYC0-1/c.aspx&gt;&lt;http://npc-news.org/UL9-2UX9B-6628G7-1AIYC0-1/c.aspx&gt;<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/5/4/6/9/3/files/imagecache/4802015/w167_2610695_logowithnpcandwords_lowres.jpg]&lt;http://npc-news.org/UL9-2UX9B-6628G7-1AIYC1-1/c.aspx&gt;<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>NPC's Annual Conference, 23 October<br>Refresh your thinking &amp; sharpen your charity's performance<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>[http://i.emlfiles4.com/cmpimg/t/s.gif]<br><br>Dear Tina,<br><br>Our 4th annual conference, in partnership with Third Sector, is just around the corner!<br><br>The new Minister for Civil Society, Rob Wilson MP,<http://npc-news.org/UL9-2UX9B-6628G7-1ASQTA-1/c.aspx> has confirmed his attendance and will take part in a panel discussion together with Lisa Nandy MP, Shadow Minister for Civil Society, and Baroness Barker, [...]</description>   <dc:date>2014-10-09T17:28:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;9d3c4c18.1410</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;c2bfbfe2.1409">   <title>Student Research Projects for organisations. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;c2bfbfe2.1409</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br><br>Northumbria University<br><br>www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see attached information for contact details.<br><br>Please reply to rachel.pain@durham.ac.uk&lt;mailto:rachel.pain@durham.ac.uk&gt; if interested, thanks.<br><br>Every year, small groups of third year students from our BA Geography degree conduct short Participatory Action Research projects for community organisations. Working with (for example) young people, asylum seekers, residents groups, museum visitors, the students define research questions with their participants, conduct research, and produce a plain English report. The students are highly skilled in research methods and analysis, usually very pleasant to deal with, and well supervised. [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-02T11:25:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;c2bfbfe2.1409</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;9bd5399e.1407">   <title>Implementing No Health without Mental Health event; 9th September 2014 Postted through Community Campus </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;9bd5399e.1407</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br><br>Northumbria University<br><br>www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see attached information for contact details.<br><br>North of England Mental Health Development Unit<br><br>Implementing No Health Without Mental Health across the North East<br>Tuesday 9th September 2014; 9:00am - 1:00pm<br>The Durham Centre, Belmont, Durham, DH1 1TN<br><br>We are delighted to be welcoming to the stage Dr Geraldine Strathdee - National Clinical Director for Mental Health; and James Seward - Mental Health and Wellbeing, Public Health England. This promises to be an inspiring, informative and valuable morning. [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-08T07:51:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;9bd5399e.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;f8e48d0f.1407">   <title>Help needed in developing a Possible Masters Course in research by third sector organisations. Posted through Community Campus </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;f8e48d0f.1407</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br><br>Northumbria University<br><br>www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see attached information for contact details.<br><br>Does your organisation need to develop its research skills?<br><br>Northumbria University is aware that there are staff of third sector and other organisations who are increasingly being called on to undertake research in various forms and who would like more training to enable them to conduct this research most effectively. For this reason, we are examining whether there would be demand for a course which would teach research skills and management with a particular focus on the workplace. We [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T09:30:49+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;f8e48d0f.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;dbc3fe70.1407">   <title>A Stitch in Time. Posted through Community Campus </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;dbc3fe70.1407</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br><br>Northumbria University<br><br>www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see attached information for contact details.<br><br>Dear All, I think you will find this a thought provoking as well as interesting and useful report from Newcastle Council for Voluntary Service.<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>Please find attached our latest study A Stitch in Time: Conversations with voluntary organisations working with young children and families in Newcastle, and its Executive summary. [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-07T09:23:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;dbc3fe70.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;128059d4.1407">   <title>New Trustees for Tyneside Womens Health </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;128059d4.1407</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br>Northumbria University<br>http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk/&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see the attached information for contact details.<br><br>Tyneside Women\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Health: looking for new Trustees<br><br>About Tyneside Women\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Health<br>Tyneside Women\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Health was set up in 1985 by a group of local women, all of whom were volunteers. The women recognised the need to provide a group where women could give and receive help from other women. The group raised funds and set up as a registered charity in July 1987. Since that time Tyneside Women\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds Health has developed from a part time project into the [...]</description>   <dc:date>2014-07-02T12:55:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;128059d4.1407</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;3f2b747a.1406">   <title>Invite to a public conversation - Growing older in my neighbourhood. May 22nd 3.30 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 5.00<br>in A207 Coach Lane Campus West<br>Northumbria University<br>NE7 7XA<br><br>Dr Sven Persson, Professor in Pedagogy at Malm\ufffd\ufffd University, Sweden, will Scandinavian model for professional development" followed by discussion. He will talk about the relation between scientific knowledge and practical knowledge and how research circles may challenge professional [...]</description>   <dc:date>2014-05-20T11:42:06+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;f79e32.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;fa4acc35.1405">   <title>Participation Academy & People Bank Event Birmingham May 22nd 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;fa4acc35.1405</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br>Northumbria University<br>http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk/&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see the attached information for contact details.<br><br>There are still some places left on this NHS England event (expenses are refundable for patients and carers - see attached)<br><br>From: Nhs.Participation England (NHS ENGLAND) [mailto:england.nhs.participation@nhs.net]<br>Sent: 13 May 2014 14:54<br>To: Undisclosed recipients<br>Subject: Places still available - Participation Academy &amp; People Bank Event Birmingham May 22nd 2014 [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-14T08:45:21+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;fa4acc35.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;162b0315.1405">   <title>Late notification of Bright Club Training - interested in fun ways of sharing research? Aged over 50?<br><br>We (the Elders Council, with Quality of Life Partnership and Northumbria and Newcastle Universities) want to have public conversations with people aged 50 years and over who live in Fenham/Wingrove area of Newcastle. Posted through Community Campus </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;ab58bf65.1404</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br><br>Northumbria University<br><br>www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see attached information for contact details.<br><br>Perhaps many of you are signed up to the ThirdSector newsletter, but just in case you missed this, we thought it was worth a read.<br><br>[Third Sector Logo]&lt;http://www.thirdsector.co.uk/home/&gt;<br>Wally Harbert: An open letter to Nick Hurd<br>Third Sector, 23 April 2014<br>[Wally Harbert says more government money should be directed at smaller, local organisations]<br>Wally Harbert says more government money should be directed at smaller, local organisations<br>While big charities get bigger with government money, the big society is [...] </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-25T16:31:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Tina Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;ab58bf65.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;7cd857f.1404">   <title>Preparing for the Better Care Fund - 10th June 2014 Posted through Community Campus </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=COMMUNITYCAMPUS;7cd857f.1404</link>   <description>Posted through Community Campus<br>Northumbria University<br>http://www.communitycampus.org.uk&lt;http://www.communitycampus.org.uk/&gt;<br><br>Please do not reply to Community Campus but see the attached information for contact details.<br><br>Open Web Version&lt;http://dmail1.westminster-briefing.com/q/1Hf06pBJj4wxlqLlXXxMo/wv&gt;
